thread.title: Didi Chuxing, Volkswagen to Unveil Ride-Hailing Joint Venture

author: William Boston
title: Didi Chuxing, Volkswagen to Unveil Ride-Hailing Joint Venture
text:
BEIJING—Volkswagen AG and ride-hailing giant Didi Chuxing are close to unveiling a joint venture to share technology and develop shared-mobility services in China, the companies said Monday.
The deal, which could be announced early next week, would be the first step in what could become a broader alliance between the world’s biggest auto maker by sales and the global leader in ride-hailing, as China races to get ahead in new mobility services such as car sharing.
